item.title: Nurburgring logistics
item.description: Spectator points https://nurb-viewpoint.com/en/ General parking (not specific to events) https://oversteer48.com/nurburgring-parking/ Maps General Parkings Parkings (ADAC 24h) Photos Directions and parking Recommendations Nurburgring Nordschleife Walking Map and Photography Locations Other https://radamring.de/en/service-en/arrival-parking/ ADAC 24h FAQ https://www.24h-rennen.de/ticket-faq/#1746436914049-1797d337-5cb8 I visited Nordschleife this Sunday for the tourist track day. I walked some parts of the circuit and took plenty of photos. I decided to make this map to help you navigate it.
